
# TROCA Training

```{r, eval=TRUE, echo=FALSE}
doc <- troca:::documentation
```

## Training material

TROCA has been trained with several materials from `r length(doc)` different sources:

```{r, eval=TRUE, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
doc |>
  purrr::imap_chr(\(x, nm) {
    paste0("* [", nm, "](", x$link, ")")
  }) |>
  cat(sep = "\n")
```

## Prompt

TROCA is set to use the following prompt:

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
cat("```{.text code-block=true}\n")
troca:::prompt |>
  stringr::str_replace(pattern = "CohortConstructor\\)\\. ", replacement = "CohortConstructor\\)\\.\n\n") |>
  stringr::str_replace(pattern = " Only", replacement = "\n\nOnly") |>
  stringr::str_replace_all(pattern = "\\-", replacement = "\n\\-") |>
  cat()
cat("\n```\n")
```
